issue.title: theguardian.com
issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] This site DOES NOT contains sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

Other ad blocker

### AdGuard version

ubo 1.43

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Annoyances — pop-ups, cookie warnings, etc.

### Which browser(s) do you use?

Firefox

### Which device do you use?

Desktop

### Where is the problem encountered?

https://www.theguardian.com/environment/2022/aug/04/sewage-sleuths-river-pollution-slow-dirty-death-of-welsh-and-english-rivers

### What filters do you have enabled?

AdGuard Annoyances filter

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

1. Some pages on The Guardian have a sign-in gate. This filter removes it:
  `||assets.guim.co.uk/assets/SignInGateSelector-importable.*.js$script,domain=theguardian.com`

2. Screenshots
<details><summary>Screenshot 1:</summary>

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/110956608/184044516-7b594dc9-d894-4520-9149-ee30d72572ed.png)

</details>


### Privacy

- [X] I agree to follow this condition

comment.body:
This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has been open for 4 days with no activity.
Unfortunately, our resources are limited and we can not always take the time to respond to requests about websites that are not popular enough. The issue will be closed if no further activity occurs.
Please note, that AdGuard Filters is an open-source project that is used by different content blockers and we welcome contributions. If you have some technical knowledge about how websites work, you are welcome to create a pull request following [these instructions](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).

pull_request.title: Fix #126022 colorlib.com
pull_request.body:
# Creating the pull request

> Please include a summary of the change and which issue is fixed\
> If the related issue does not exist in our repository, please create it before making pull request\
> It is highly recommended to use our [Web Reporting Tool](https://kb.adguard.com/en/technical-support/reporting-tool) instead of creating an issue on GitHub directly\
> Please note, that we verify every pull request manually, so it may take time to apply it

## Prerequisites

### To avoid invalid pull requests, please check and confirm following terms

- [x] This is not an ad/bug report;
- [x] My code follows the [guidelines](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md) and [syntax](https://kb.adguard.com/general/how-to-create-your-own-ad-filters) of this project;
- [x] I have performed a self-review of my own changes;
- [x] My changes do not break web sites, apps and files structure.

## What problem does the pull request fix?

### If the problem does not fall under any category that is listed here, please write a comment below in corresponding section

- [x] Missed ads or ad leftovers;
- [ ] Website or app doesn't work properly;
- [ ] AdGuard gets detected on a website;
- [ ] Missed analytics or tracker;
- [ ] Social media buttons — share, like, tweet, etc;
- [ ] Annoyances — pop-ups, cookie warnings, etc;
- [ ] Filters maintenance.

## What issue is being fixed?

### Enter the issue address

Closes #126022

### Add your comment and screenshots

`https://colorlib.com/wp/themes/activello/`

<details><summary>Image</summary>

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/103899764/184554451-70df67a1-9f1a-460c-b216-2e1d19dbeebb.png)


</details>

https://publicwww.com/websites/%22%2Fcdn-cgi%2Fzaraz%2F%22/

### Terms

- [x] By submitting this issue, I agree that pull request does not contain private info and all conditions are met

pull_request.body:
# Creating the pull request

> Please include a summary of the change and which issue is fixed\
> If the related issue does not exist in our repository, please create it before making pull request\
> It is highly recommended to use our [Web Reporting Tool](https://kb.adguard.com/en/technical-support/reporting-tool) instead of creating an issue on GitHub directly\
> Please note, that we verify every pull request manually, so it may take time to apply it

## Prerequisites

### To avoid invalid pull requests, please check and confirm following terms

- [ ] This is not an ad/bug report;
- [ ] My code follows the [guidelines](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md) and [syntax](https://kb.adguard.com/general/how-to-create-your-own-ad-filters) of this project;
- [ ] I have performed a self-review of my own changes;
- [ ] My changes do not break web sites, apps and files structure.

## What problem does the pull request fix?

### If the problem does not fall under any category that is listed here, please write a comment below in corresponding section

- [ ] Missed ads or ad leftovers;
- [ ] Website or app doesn't work properly;
- [ ] AdGuard gets detected on a website;
- [ ] Missed analytics or tracker;
- [ ] Social media buttons — share, like, tweet, etc;
- [ ] Annoyances — pop-ups, cookie warnings, etc;
- [ ] Filters maintenance.

## What issue is being fixed?

### #124735

### Add your comment and screenshots

#### If possible, a screenshot of a page or application should not be cropped too much. Otherwise, it is not always clear where the element is located

0. **DO NOT** upload screenshots with sexually explicit material on GitHub directly.\
 Instead, upload it to a third-party image hosting and post the link to it without preview (!) here.\
 Also, mention if the link leads to NSFW content;

1. Add screenshots of the problem. You can drag and drop images or paste them from clipboard

    Use `<details> </details>` tag to hide screenshots under the spoiler;

2. Describe the issue in detail until it is absolutely clear from the screenshot what the problem is

    You can also indicate any other information that you think the developers should know.

**Warning:** Please remove personal information before uploading screenshots!

1. Your comment

<!-- Please write a comment here -->

2. Screenshots

<details>

<summary>Screenshot 1:</summary>

<!-- paste screenshot here -->

</details>

<details>

<summary>Screenshot N:</summary>

<!-- paste screenshot here -->

</details>

### Terms

- [ ] By submitting this issue, I agree that pull request does not contain private info and all conditions are met

This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has been open for 4 days with no activity.
Unfortunately, our resources are limited and we can not always take the time to respond to requests about websites that are not popular enough. The issue will be closed if no further activity occurs.
Please note, that AdGuard Filters is an open-source project that is used by different content blockers and we welcome contributions. comment.body:
This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has been open for 4 days with no activity.
Unfortunately, our resources are limited and we can not always take the time to respond to requests about websites that are not popular enough. The issue will be closed if no further activity occurs.
Please note, that AdGuard Filters is an open-source project that is used by different content blockers and we welcome contributions. If you have some technical knowledge about how websites work, you are welcome to create a pull request following [these instructions](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).

issue.title: mail.yandex.ru

labels.name: Extra
labels.description: Issues, related to AdGuard Extra extension

labels.name: A: Problematic
labels.description: Issues, which cannot be resolved easily

issue.body:
### ВНИМАНИЕ

Пользователям программы для `Windows`, `macOS` или `Android` нужно включить расширение `AdGuard Extra` в настройках программы.

---

Пользователям браузерного расширения нужно установить [расширение AdGuard Extra](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdGuardExtra#how-to-install-adguard-extra) либо скрипт `AdGuard Extra`(этот вариант может не везде срабатыавать). 

<details><summary>Установка скрипта  "AdGuard Extra" в расширение "Tampermonkey"  :</summary>

Для установки скрипта понадобится браузерное расширение-скриптоприёмник `Tampermonkey`

Ссылка на `AdGuard Extra`
https://userscripts.adtidy.org/beta/adguard-extra/1.0/adguard-extra.user.js

После установки скрипта нужно будет зайти в настройки `Tampermonkey`, включить режим эксперта, переключить режим встраивания на `мгновенный` и перезапустить расширение:
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/8361299/62641343-07248e00-b94c-11e9-9775-9854a7922889.png)

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/8361299/62641299-f7a54500-b94b-11e9-8a83-885d89abbeec.png)

</details>

comment.body: Должен быть установлен наш скрипт, прочтите [этот пост](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/114336#issue-1189941591).

Annoyances — pop-ups, cookie warnings, etc.

### Which browser(s) do you use?

Firefox

### Which device do you use?

Desktop

### Where is the problem encountered?

https://archive.vanityfair.com/article/2022/7/1/good-vibrations

### What filters do you have enabled?

AdGuard Annoyances filter

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

1. On pages that are subscriber-only, the magazine viewer popup does not work. In this case, the sign-in-to-account popup should still display (but remain removed on free articles where the magazine viewer popup *does* work). To do this, we can adjust the existing AdGuard Annoyance filter from
  `archive.vanityfair.com#$#.bnd_subscribe { display: none !important; }`
  to
  `archive.vanityfair.com#$#body.page_shared .bnd_subscribe { display: none !important; }`.

If you’re using AdGuard for Windows, Mac or Android, please make sure that AdGuard Extra is enabled in the application settings.

If you’re using AdGuard Browser Extension, we suggest installing AdGuard Extra in addition to it.

Other ad blocker

ubo 1.43

Annoyances — pop-ups, cookie warnings, etc.

Firefox

Desktop

https://scroll.in/article/1030014/for-the-british-indian-army-maintaining-soldiers-gardens-was-serious-business

AdGuard Annoyances filter

_No response_

1. `scroll.in###supportStrap` support banner ad at top of page

comment.body:
This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has been open for 4 days with no activity.
Unfortunately, our resources are limited and we can not always take the time to respond to requests about websites that are not popular enough. The issue will be closed if no further activity occurs.
Please note, that AdGuard Filters is an open-source project that is used by different content blockers and we welcome contributions. If you have some technical knowledge about how websites work, you are welcome to create a pull request following [these instructions](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).

- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

AdGuard DNS

### AdGuard version

adguard-dns.io

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Website or app doesn't work properly

### Which browser(s) do you use?

the problem is with app, not a site

### Which device do you use?

Mobile

### Where is the problem encountered?

https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.spotify.music

### What filters do you have enabled?

AdGuard DNS filter

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

##### To reproduce:

1. With my DNS set to `c6-----.d.adguard-dns.com` in Android's settings.

2. Open Spotify on the phone while playing songs on another device, it does not show the current playing song or controls for changing it. It does not download any song.

3. Put something to play on the phone itself, then I don't see any new scrobbles on https://www.last.fm/user/PeHLC (even after songs ends).

##### To temporarily fix it:

4. Changes my DNS to `one.one.one.one` in Android's settings.

5. Restarts Spotify on phone.

6. Songs start to download, songs playing in other machines suddenly appears, past scrobbles are submitted to Last.fm and can be seen in my profile.

##### Other details:

1. I have a cookie in adguard-dns.io that says `user:"32362--"`

2. Searching for Spotify blocked queries in statistics shows nothing in the past 7 days: https://adguard-dns.io/en/dashboard/statistics/query?limit=20&statuses%5B0%5D=REQUEST_BLOCKED&statuses%5B1%5D=RESPONSE_BLOCKED&companies%5B0%5D=spotify&retention=DAYS_7

3. Spotify version is 8.7.54.403

### Privacy

- [X] I agree to follow this condition

rbc.ua$$[class^="amp-ad"]
rbc.ua##[class^="amp-ad"]

issue.title: Festool sites - Broken functions (AdGuard Annoyances filter) [GDPR]

labels.name: A: In progress
labels.description: Work on the issue is in progress

issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] This site DOES NOT contains sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

Other ad blocker

### AdGuard version

uBlock Origin v1.43.0

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Website or app doesn't work properly

### Which browser(s) do you use?

other(specify in comment below)

### Which device do you use?

Desktop

### Where is the problem encountered?

https://www.festool.at/
https://www.festool.be/

https://www.festoolusa.com/

### What filters do you have enabled?

AdGuard Annoyances filter

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

### Affected sites:
```
https://www.festool.at/
https://www.festool.be/
https://www.festool.bg/
https://www.festool.ch/
https://www.festool.cn/

https://www.festool.se/
https://www.festool.sk/
https://www.festool.ua/
https://www.festoolcanada.com/
https://www.festoolusa.com/
```

### Issue:
The "**MyFestool**", "**Wish list**" and "**Search**" buttons, in the page header, doesn't work!

### Screenshot:
Not needed, as the problem is obvious.

### Problem filter:
* **AdGuard Annoyances filter**

### Problem rule:
`||usercentrics.eu^$third-party`

### Possible fix (ABP and uBO Legacy compatible):
`@@||usercentrics.eu^$third-party,domain=festool.at|festool.be|festool.bg|festool.ch|festool.cn|festool.co.kr|festool.co.uk|festool.co.za|festool.com|festool.cz|festool.de|festool.dk|festool.es|festool.fi|festool.fr|festool.hu|festool.ie|festool.it|festool.lt|festool.nl|festool.no|festool.pl|festool.pt|festool.ro|festool.ru|festool.se|festool.sk|festool.ua|festoolcanada.com|festoolusa.com`

### Other problem filters:
* ~~**Easylist Cookie List** / **Fanboy's Annoyance List** https://github.com/easylist/easylist/issues/12930/~~ _(FIXED)_
~~`||usercentrics.eu^$third-party`~~

This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has been open for 4 days with no activity.
Unfortunately, our resources are limited and we can not always take the time to respond to requests about websites that are not popular enough. The issue will be closed if no further activity occurs.
Please note, that AdGuard Filters is an open-source project that is used by different content blockers and we welcome contributions. If you have some technical knowledge about how websites work, you are welcome to create a pull request following [these instructions](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).

issue.title: Disable eksisozluk ad theme option
issue.body:
# Creating the pull request

> Please include a summary of the change and which issue is fixed\
> If the related issue does not exist in our repository, please create it before making pull request\
> It is highly recommended to use our [Web Reporting Tool](https://kb.adguard.com/en/technical-support/reporting-tool) instead of creating an issue on GitHub directly\
> Please note, that we verify every pull request manually, so it may take time to apply it

## Prerequisites

### To avoid invalid pull requests, please check and confirm following terms

- [ ] This is not an ad/bug report;
- [ ] My code follows the [guidelines](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md) and [syntax](https://kb.adguard.com/general/how-to-create-your-own-ad-filters) of this project;
- [ ] I have performed a self-review of my own changes;
- [ ] My changes do not break web sites, apps and files structure.

## What problem does the pull request fix?

### If the problem does not fall under any category that is listed here, please write a comment below in corresponding section

- [ ] Missed ads or ad leftovers;
- [ ] Website or app doesn't work properly;
- [ ] AdGuard gets detected on a website;
- [ ] Missed analytics or tracker;
- [ ] Social media buttons — share, like, tweet, etc;
- [ ] Annoyances — pop-ups, cookie warnings, etc;
- [ ] Filters maintenance.

## What issue is being fixed?

### #124735

### Add your comment and screenshots

#### If possible, a screenshot of a page or application should not be cropped too much. Otherwise, it is not always clear where the element is located

0. **DO NOT** upload screenshots with sexually explicit material on GitHub directly.\
 Instead, upload it to a third-party image hosting and post the link to it without preview (!) here.\
 Also, mention if the link leads to NSFW content;

1. Add screenshots of the problem. You can drag and drop images or paste them from clipboard

    Use `<details> </details>` tag to hide screenshots under the spoiler;

2. Describe the issue in detail until it is absolutely clear from the screenshot what the problem is

    You can also indicate any other information that you think the developers should know.

**Warning:** Please remove personal information before uploading screenshots!

1. Your comment

<!-- Please write a comment here -->

2. Screenshots

<details>

<summary>Screenshot 1:</summary>

<!-- paste screenshot here -->

</details>

<details>

<summary>Screenshot N:</summary>

<!-- paste screenshot here -->

</details>

### Terms

- [ ] By submitting this issue, I agree that pull request does not contain private info and all conditions are met

AdGuard for Android

Social media buttons — share, like, tweet, etc.

Chrome

Mobile

https://hightech.fm/2022/08/01/printing-myths/amp

AdGuard Base filter, AdGuard Mobile Ads filter, AdGuard Russian filter, AdGuard Tracking Protection filter, AdGuard URL Tracking filter, AdGuard Social Media filter, AdGuard Annoyances filter, AdGuard DNS filter, AdGuard Experimental filter

_No response_

comment.body:
This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has been open for 4 days with no activity.
Unfortunately, our resources are limited and we can not always take the time to respond to requests about websites that are not popular enough. The issue will be closed if no further activity occurs.
Please note, that AdGuard Filters is an open-source project that is used by different content blockers and we welcome contributions. If you have some technical knowledge about how websites work, you are welcome to create a pull request following [these instructions](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).

### Внимание

Эта проблема решается с помощью расширения [AdGuard Extra](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdGuardExtra).

Если вы используете AdGuard для Windows, Mac или Android, пожалуйста, убедитесь, что AdGuard Extra включен в настройках программы.

Если вы используете браузерное расширение AdGuard, мы рекомендуем установить AdGuard Extra в дополнение к нему.

* [Установить в Chrome, Edge или другой браузер на основе Chromium](https://agrd.io/adguard_extra_chrome_release)
* [Установить в Firefox](https://agrd.io/adguard_extra_firefox_release)

labels.name: NSFW
labels.description: Nudes and porn sites

labels.name: Extra
labels.description: Issues, related to AdGuard Extra extension

labels.name: A: Problematic
labels.description: Issues, which cannot be resolved easily

issue.body:
Включите расширение AdGuard Extra в настройках программы.

---

Пользователям браузерного расширения нужно установить скрипт `AdGuard Extra`. Для этого понадобится браузерное расширение-скриптоприёмник `Tampermonkey`

Ссылка на `AdGuard Extra`
https://userscripts.adtidy.org/beta/adguard-extra/1.0/adguard-extra.user.js

После установки скрипта нужно будет зайти в настройки `Tampermonkey`, включить режим эксперта, переключить режим встраивания на `мгновенный` и перезапустить расширение:
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/8361299/62641343-07248e00-b94c-11e9-9775-9854a7922889.png)

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/8361299/62641299-f7a54500-b94b-11e9-8a83-885d89abbeec.png)

This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has been open for 4 days with no activity.
Unfortunately, our resources are limited and we can not always take the time to respond to requests about websites that are not popular enough. The issue will be closed if no further activity occurs.
Please note, that AdGuard Filters is an open-source project that is used by different content blockers and we welcome contributions. If you have some technical knowledge about how websites work, you are welcome to create a pull request following [these instructions](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).

comment.body:
### Issue URL (Anti Adblock Script) [https://www.channel5.com/show/jeremy-vine/season-2022/episode-161](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.channel5.com%2Fshow%2Fjeremy-vine%2Fseason-2022%2Fepisode-161) ### Comment > www.channel5.com used to work fine until just-recently, but now it detects AdGuard and displays the following error when you attempt to watch any programme or live TV: "Please disable Ad Blocker to make sure you have the best experiencing watching content on My5". I have tried enabling the "Annoyances" filter (I turned the parent category on, so all child blockers were all on) but after refreshing the page and deleting cookies it made no difference and still detects AdGuard. Page only works when it is disabled (see screenshots). ### Screenshots

comment.body:
@Alex-302 данные запрос в Журнале фильтрации отображаются как Modified Metadata. Вот адрес запроса, из-за модификации которого не работает нормально логин:
```
https://web.np.playstation.com/api/settings/v2/users/me/settings?settings=PersonalizedRecommendations,PersonalizedAds
```

-----

Затем при открытии Account Settings из-за модификации этого запроса появляется ошибка:
```
https://accounts.api.playstation.com/api/v1/accounts/me/communication
```

-----

При попытке открыть настройки Profile в разделе PlayStation Network начинается бесконечная перезагрузка страницы из-за модификации этого запроса:
```
https://web.np.playstation.com/api/basicProfile/v1/profile/users/me
```

Но после его добавления в исключения страница всё ещё перезагружалась бесконечно, но появились новые запросы:
```
https://web.np.playstation.com/api/communicationRestrictionStatus/v3/users/me/communication/restriction/status
https://accounts.api.playstation.com/api/v2/verifiedAccounts/me
и другие...
```

Поэтому я добавил такие исключения, чтобы мне было проще:
```
@@web.np.playstation.com/api^$stealth
@@accounts.api.playstation.com/api^$stealth
```

И стал искать дальше, что ещё взывает перезагрузку страницы. И выяснил, что проблема из-за этих двух запросов:
```
https://asm.np.community.playstation.net/asm/v1/apps/me/baseUrls/userProfile
https://tr-prof.np.community.playstation.net/userProfile/v1/users/me/profile2?fields=avatarUrls
```

-----

Затем при нажатии Edit напротив Online ID я получал ошибку из-за модификации этого запроса:
```
https://ias.api.playstation.com/v2/accounts/me/onlineIdChange/eligibility
```

-----

Затем при открытии Privacy Settings я получал ошибку из-за модификации этих запросов:
```
https://privacysettings.api.playstation.com/v1/users/me/settings/LoyaltyDigitalCollectible?t=1660591974384
https://privacysettings.api.playstation.com/v1/users/me/settings/PlayerTagActivityPrivacy?t=1660592126476
и скорее всего других...
```

Поэтому добавил более общее исключение, которое исправило это проблему:
```
@@privacysettings.api.playstation.com/v1/users/me/settings^$stealth
```

-----

Затем не получалось открыть Device Managment из-за модификации этого запроса:
```
https://dms.api.playstation.com/api/v1/devices/accounts/me
```

-----

И когда я отключил `Block third-party Authorization header`, ни одна из проблем не воспроизвелась.

Также при переходе между страницами меня просили ввести пароль иногда, но я не знаю, связано ли это с AdGuard, или просто из-за того что много запросов с одного IP-адреса или просто так сайт настроен, но это проверять у меня уже нет желания.

В итоге можно добавить такие правила, чтобы их было немного, но они были довольно точными:
```
@@api.playstation.com^$stealth
@@web.np.playstation.com/api^$stealth
@@np.community.playstation.net^$stealth
```

comment.body:
### Внимание

Эта проблема решается с помощью расширения [AdGuard Extra](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdGuardExtra).

Если вы используете AdGuard для Windows, Mac или Android, пожалуйста, убедитесь, что AdGuard Extra включен в настройках программы.

Если вы используете браузерное расширение AdGuard, мы рекомендуем установить AdGuard Extra в дополнение к нему.

* [Установить в Chrome, Edge или другой браузер на основе Chromium](https://agrd.io/adguard_extra_chrome_release)
* [Установить в Firefox](https://agrd.io/adguard_extra_firefox_release)

comment.body:
This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has been open for 4 days with no activity.
Unfortunately, our resources are limited and we can not always take the time to respond to requests about websites that are not popular enough. The issue will be closed if no further activity occurs.
Please note, that AdGuard Filters is an open-source project that is used by different content blockers and we welcome contributions. If you have some technical knowledge about how websites work, you are welcome to create a pull request following [these instructions](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).

issue.title: Вопрос.
issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] This site DOES NOT contains sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

AdGuard for Android

### AdGuard version

v3.6.8 (46)

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Missed analytics or tracker

### Which browser(s) do you use?

Chrome

### Which device do you use?

Mobile

### Where is the problem encountered?

https://news.google.com/foryou?hl=ru&gl=UA&ceid=UA%3Aru

### What filters do you have enabled?

AdGuard Base filter, AdGuard Mobile Ads filter, AdGuard Russian filter, AdGuard Tracking Protection filter, AdGuard URL Tracking filter, AdGuard Social Media filter, AdGuard Annoyances filter, AdGuard DNS filter, AdGuard Experimental filter

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

Hide your search queries, Send Do-Not-Track signals, Hide Referrer from third-parties (specify in comment below, if used custom value), Remove X-Client-Data header from HTTP requests

### Add your comment and screenshots

Мне кажется или этот трекер нужно заблокировать?


<details><summary>Screenshot:</summary>

![Screenshot_20220816-004035](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/34476664/184723630-c7844149-2bca-4e35-8079-c2cd0812538f.jpg)
</details>


### Privacy
